backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking deployment documentation and components for publishing the site on the Internet Computer.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing autogenerated summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide outlining prerequisites and steps for building and deploying the site to the Internet Computer.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, fonts, and mounting root for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component that renders the MarketingPage.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with business copyright, caffeine.ai attribution, and dynamic hostname tracking.
frontend/src/components/MarketingPage.ts: Page layout assembling navigation, all content sections, and footer.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Contact section featuring booking phone number, availability info, pricing note, and CTA button.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero section with main heading, subheading, pricing note, and call-to-action buttons.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Services grid showing three offerings with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/sections/Vehicle: Vehicle gallery displaying three bus images with captions and comfort messaging.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhyChoo: Renders the Why Choose section using branding data and mapped Lucide icons in a responsive grid layout.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Sticky navigation bar with smooth-scroll links and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/content/branding.ts: Provides centralized branding text, contact info, and structured data arrays for services and why‑choose items.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, status handling, and persisted identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module exporting nothing because the site uses static content only.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for a blue‑and‑white design with light/dark mode.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors from CSS vars, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata, requirements, existing features, and the marketing site’s overall goals.
